item.title: Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
item.description: The president blamed foreign-made movies for the American film industry's "very fast death".

item.title: Israel security cabinet approves plan to expand Gaza offensive
item.description: The Israeli military has called up tens of thousands of reservists, saying it is aiming to increase pressure on Hamas.

item.title: Nationalist Simion wins first round of Romanian election rerun
item.description: Romania's previous presidential election was cancelled over allegations of campaign fraud and Russian interference.

item.title: Trump orders reopening of notorious Alcatraz prison
item.description: President Trump says the famous island prison off San Francisco is to be reopened to house "ruthless and violent" offenders.

item.title: NZ airport to remove Hobbit-themed eagle sculptures
item.description: For more than a decade, the giant eagles have cast a watchful eye over visitors at Wellington Airport.
